text: Return (Persian: Bazgasht) is a 1953 Iranian drama film directed by Samouel Khachikian.Issari p.272 ==Cast== * Arman * Hayedeh * Mehri Aghili * Ezzatollah Vosoogh * Shahin * Akbar Khajavi * Rahim Roshanian * Massoud Poor Zanjani == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Iranian films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Samuel Khachikian
title: Return (1953 film)
